item.title: How To Play Games on Slack - A Beginners' Guide
item.description: How To Play Games on Slack - A Beginners’ Guide Slack is a great tool for remote teams. It’s an easy way to work on projects, chat, share files and play games together as a team. In fact, some companies have even created their own Slack bots that allow employees to engage with each other with by playing games during the work day. But, you do not have to go this far.
